page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: {The Commercial Vehicle Museum}contains many old exhibits connected with Leyland Motors(British Leyland including the{Pope Mobile.} {Worden Park}(160 acres) has a{Craft {Centre}providing accommodation for a potter,a wood-turner,a saddler,a blacksmith an enameller and a landscape artist. The park also has a miniature railway,playground,football pitches duck pond,a trim trail and woodland walks.A children's{Play {Scheme}is held in the Park each summer where the childen come and enjoy supervised activities like drama,treasure hunts,art and craft disco dancing and every sport and game you can imagine.{The Hall}over looking the woods and playing fields,dates back to the fourteenth century and was once owned by the Ffarington family.
